By CHB on Thursday, March 18, 2004 - 01:30 pm:

Ok dude, I'm no programmer and I could never make anything like this.

I thought it started off slow, kinda static with his walk, but then it came into a full blown dance routine and I LOVED IT!

I would say add sound, you don't need to time it or anything, just add a catchy techno beat or something to help set the mood. Just adding a song, and leaving the CGI like it is, is what I mean. Not required though.

Excellent work, my man. Very excellent work.
